short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: N4G enhancement suite. Resizable pictures, language filter correction, quickquoting, and more

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhancement sweet for N4G.FreeForums.net
-  Resizable pictures - click to drag posted photos to desired size

- Gfycat support - post links to Gfycat Pro will automatically embed them

-  Quickquoting - quote forum members and share pictures without leaving the page

- Ignore language filter - Pro will uncensor the words posted in the forums

- Upload hidden photos - share any image you want with other Pro users

- Quick return - Jump between the quick reply box and posts with the added return buttons
